quest_desc.qdesc: 공작 스튜어트는 나름대로 국왕 카시우스에게 잘해주려고 하지만, 그 마음이 전해지지 않아 섭섭해 함.

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, I am.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
(Duke Stuart looks at you displeased.)
Are you {user_nick}?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There is nothing really important.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
Recently, you seem to be speaking to His Majesty in secret.
What are you telling him?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I don't know what you are talking about.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
Although it's not an important issue, he left me behind because of you. Even though I'm his uncle and the guardian of the royal family.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Need to clear up Duke Stuart 's misunderstanding.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
Although he is smart but not so brave at heart since he's still young. I'm sure that you are influencing his young mind using your sweet talk.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
I've been working hard for him.
After my brother passed away from a illiness, I have thought of him as a real son.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
I've tried to weaken the military that threatened the authority and to protect him from veiled plots conducted by ministers in the castle.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I know.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
However you earn his favour faster than me, even with your earthy monster smells. He is different from you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I've never done that.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
You influenced your crude tastes on him, although you know your position. Didn't you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Please give me some time to defend myself.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
Do you think I can't see anything?
Do you think that I didn't see you giving him the Adventure Book?
(Stuart continues to press you.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Of course, I know His Majesty is fond of a childish hobby.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
Hah? You're arrogant and rude.
Alright, let's listen to your excuse.
However if you tell any lies in your excuse, you'll be expelled from here right away.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No, I think you forgot about one thing.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
So do you admit that you are a bad influence on him?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>His Majesty is a child.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
No?
What did I forget?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You had a childhood once, didn't you?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
He is not just a child.
He is the king who has the Great King of Knight's blood.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Duke Stuart didn't say anything for a while, remembering his past.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
Huh, my childhood was not childish like yours.
It was full of classes for manners, studies about the emperor always.
And... my only friend was my brother, the former king.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You had a brother. But he is alone.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
You can never imagine.
I can't believe anyone because of the pressure of greedy ministers and attacks by monsters.
The ones I can wholly trust are my parents and brother... only my family.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>A child needs a peer.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
What?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That might be the reason that His Majesty is comfortable with me.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
(Duke Stuart thinks)
Alright, my brother left him as an only child. Certainly, I was more relaxed with my brother who was around my age, than people who were far older than me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
What a rude man. How dare you try to teach me, the duke of this country?
Yes, His Majesty likes you as a child.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There's no way to prove.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
But, how would you prove that you did not get close to him, with an evil plot in your mind?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I just don't feel it's necessary to prove something over nothing at all.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
(Duke smiles a little bit.)
 Aren't you a clever man?
Or just plain rude and annoyed to bother making up the proof?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Or you can take advantage of me.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
Interesting.
It doesn't mean that I will leave you alive if you harm this kingdom.
I can always jail or expel you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>For instance, a bridge between His Majesty and you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
An advantage?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, I could be useful in other ways as well for Duke.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
(Stuart is intrigued.)
You are willing to help me improve the relationship between us?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
You are rude to the end.
(He scolds with a smile.)

$Duke Stuart$
Alright. You're so rude {user_nick}!
Work for me.
I'll call you when I need you.
(You've established a closer relationship with Duke Stuart.)
